response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. This extraordinary item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and we are excited to offer it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. We believe this offer presents a unique opportunity for you to acquire a piece that not only fulfills your requirements but also adds significant value to your collection or investment portfolio. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 950000}
